channel.title: Blog on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Blog
item.description: May 24, 2021 April 22, 2021 May 24, 2021 Michael Elder put together a user walk through for the basic Open Cluster Management API using kind, olm, and other open source technologies. See https://github.com/mdelder/open-cluster-management-getting-started for more details. April 22, 2021 Inspired by the famous article Kubernetes The Hard Way, Dario Minonne created a tutorial for setting up Open Cluster Management the hard way.
